explanation_ka:
B1 დონეზე ვისწავლეთ ვნებითი გვარის საფუძვლები. ახლა განვიხილოთ რთული პასიური სტრუქტურები, რომლებიც ფორმალურ და აკადემიურ ინგლისურში გამოიყენება.

**1. Impersonal Passive (უპიროვნო პასივი)**
It is said that... = ამბობენ, რომ...
It is believed that he is innocent. = ითვლება, რომ უდანაშაულოა.
He is believed to be innocent. = იგი უდანაშაულოდ ითვლება.

ზმნები: say, believe, think, know, report, expect, consider, claim, allege

**2. ორი სტრუქტურა:**
- It + passive + that-clause: It is reported that the company is bankrupt.
- Subject + passive + to-infinitive: The company is reported to be bankrupt.

**3. Perfect Infinitive პასივში**
He is said to have left the country. = ამბობენ, რომ ქვეყანა დატოვა (წარსულში).
She is believed to have been working there for years.

**4. have/get something done (უარყოფითი კონტექსტი)**
I had my wallet stolen. = საფულე მომპარეს. (არასასურველი მოვლენა)

**5. პასივი მოდალებთან**
This should have been done earlier. = ეს ადრე უნდა გაკეთებულიყო.
The report must be submitted by Friday.

| სტრუქტურა | მაგალითი | თარგმანი |
|-----------|----------|----------|
| It is said that... | It is said that he is rich | ამბობენ, მდიდარია |
| S + is said + to V | He is said to be rich | მდიდარია, ამბობენ |
| S + is said + to have V3 | He is said to have left | ამბობენ, წავიდა |
| It is thought that... | It is thought that... | ფიქრობენ, რომ... |

examples.en: It is believed that the Earth is 4.5 billion years old.
She is said to be the best doctor in the city.
examples.ka: ამბობენ, რომ ის ქალაქის საუკეთესო ექიმია.

examples.en: The suspect is reported to have fled the country.
It is expected that prices will rise.
The meeting is thought to have been cancelled.
He had his car broken into last night.
This should have been finished yesterday.
The bridge is known to have been built by Romans.

common_mistakes_ka:
ხშირი შეცდომები:
1) to-ს გამოტოვება:
❌ He is said be rich.
✅ He is said to be rich.

2) It is said + to infinitive (არასწორი კომბინაცია):
❌ It is said to be rich. (ვინ?)
✅ He is said to be rich. ან It is said that he is rich.

3) დროების აღრევა — წარსულისთვის 'to have + V3':
❌ He is said to leave yesterday.
✅ He is said to have left yesterday.

4) 'have something done' — უარყოფითი მოვლენისთვისაც გამოიყენება:
I had my wallet stolen. = მომპარეს (არა მე ვაპარებინე)

exercises.question: It ___ (believe) that the treasure is hidden here.
She is said ___ (be) the richest woman in the country.
He is reported ___ (leave) the country last week.
It is expected that the project ___ (complete) by December.
რომელია სწორი?
options: It is said to rain tomorrow.
It is said that it will rain tomorrow.
exercises.answer: It is said that it will rain tomorrow.

exercises.question: The bridge is known ___ (build) in the 18th century.
This work should ___ (do) a long time ago.
It ___ (think) that the economy will recover soon.
The painting is considered ___ (be) a masterpiece.
'ამბობენ, რომ ის წავიდა' — ინგლისურად:
options: He is said to have left.
exercises.answer: He is said to have left.
